name: Dr. Emoji
description:
[Made for Global Game Jam 2020]

When you're overwhelmed with emojis, Dr. Emoji is here to help! Six patients come to pour their hearts out, and the good therapist will give them their wise counsel. Or not.

 It's up to you to interpret what is the issue and how to best help them repair themselves. Interpret the emojis, give your best guess and get the thumbs-up as a reward!

GAME CONTROLS PC:

Use the mouse left-click to select your replies.

DOWNLOAD & INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: PC: 

Download and extract the zip file, then run Dr. Emoji.exe

OUTSOURCED MUSIC

Main track: Jussi Elsilä SFX:  Freesound

ANIMATIONS

Character animations: Mixamo
